Barsa i Kai Haverc - šta su pokazale dve godine kontinuiranog skautiranja?
Da li je Nemac lek za probleme katalonskog velikana?

07 Nov 2019

Barselonina rezultatska kriza uzela je maha, a posle “teških“ 0:0 protiv Slavije iz Praga pritisak koji na svojim leđima nose igrači i pogotovo Ernesto Valverde veći je nego ikada ranije.
Drastičnom padu kvaliteta doprinelo je više faktora. Ako je u srži problema činjenica da se ekipa previše oslanja na Lionela Mesija koji jednostavno ne uspeva da izvuče Barselonu iz svake situacije, onda je rame uz rame loš plan rada na transfer pijaci i nedostatak prave ideje kako što bezboljnije izvršiti smenu generacija. Barselona se poslednjih godina nekoliko puta strašno opekla posle astronomskih kupovina koje su se pokazale kao nedovoljno dobro. Filipe Kutinjo je samo jedan primer, Usman Dembele i dalje hoda na ivici provalije, a za njih dvojicu Barselona je platila preko 300.000.000 evra od momenta kada je Nejmar prešao u PSŽ za rekordnih 222.000.000 evra. Problemi sa odbranom, a pogotovo sa trošenjem previše novca za štopere od kojih se još traži kvalitet da naslede Đerara Pikea i Karlesa Pujola su priča za sebe. 
Suštinski, Barselona je povukla suviše pogrešnih poteza poslednjih godina i sada se oslikavaju rezultati takvog poslovanja. Zbog toga se u Barseloni intenzivno radi na tome da se višegodišnji kiksevi obrišu i naprave pametni potezi u kontinuitetu... U potrazi za adekvatnim kreativcima Barselonini skauti često su se zaustavljali kod imena Kaija Haverca. 
Nemački reprezentativac dugo je u Barsinom skauting sistemu, ali dosad su se uvek pronalazili razlozi zašto bi se njegovo ime izbegavalo kada dođe vreme kupovine u letnjem ili zimskom prelaznom roku.
Barselonini emisari, otkrivaju to katalonski mediji, Haverca prate na svakoj utakmici u poslednje dve godine! Toliko ozbiljno se pristupilo analizi igrača koji bi mogao da bude novi veliki zalog na fudbalskom tržištu. Sve je počelo još u decembru 2017. godine, kada je prepoznat njegov talenat, a pre svega osećaj za golove, dribling i asistenciju što je potvrdilo njegovu dobru viziju igre. Teoretski, Haverc je igrač koji bi se savršeno uklopio u Barselonin sistem, jer nesebičan fudbaler sposoban da izdrži veliki pritisak rivala i otvori igru u tranziciji.
Naravno, skauti su bili prisutni i na stadionu Bajera gde je Leverkuzen razbio madridski Atletiko s 2:1, a Kai Haverc imao je jednu od vodećih uloga. Ugledajući se na primer Frenkija de Jonga, Barselonina transfer politika mogla bi da doživi veliki zaokret i konačno ponovo bude u rangu klupskog renomea. Da povrati izgubljeni identitet pametne kupovine i dovođenja igrača koji zaista mogu da naprave razliku. To je, uostalom, ono što Barseloni sada nedostaje.
Prema informacijama iz Katalonije, Haverc je ostvario drastičan napredak u igri u odnosu na pre dve godine. Osim čistih tehničkih kvaliteta, Haverc je dosta poradio na tome da podjednako dobro pokrije levi i desni bok veznog reda. Uz izražene napadačke kvalitete sada više pažnje posvećuje odbrani i vršenju pritiska na protivničke veziste kako bi usporio razvoj akcija. To se u Kataoniji ozbiljno ceni.
Navodno, deo klupske uprave veruje da je naredno leto pravo vreme da se krene u potpunu ofanzivu na Haverca, a čak postoje i priče da je s njim uspostavljen neformalni kontakt i da mu je u lice saopšteno da ga žele na stadionu Kamp Nou sledećeg leta.
Ostaje samo da se razjasni pitanje njegove cene. U Bajeru su svesni da na Havercove igre motre ljudi iz Bajerna, Liverpula i Mančester junajteda, pa samim tim vrednost njihovog bisera raste. Trenutno je cena postavljena na 100.000.000 evra, ali niko ne može da garantuje da se to neće promeniti uskoro.
Ako Haverc bude nastavio da podiže ritam i gradi igre na temelju prošle sezone, Barseona neće imati drugi izbor nego da opet probije barijeru i upiše još jedan transfer s devet cifara...

Barsa and Kai Haverc - what did two years of continuous scouting show?
Is German a cure for the problems of the Catalan giant?

07 Nov 2019

Barcelona's result crisis has taken a beating, and after a heavy 0-0 draw against Slavia from Prague, the pressure on the back of the players and especially Ernesto Valverde is greater than ever before.
Several factors contributed to the drastic decline in quality. If at the core of the problem is the fact that the team relies too much on Lionel Messi, who simply fails to get Barcelona out of every situation, then side by side is a bad plan for transfer markets and a lack of a real idea how to make the shift of generations as seamless as possible. In recent years, Barcelona has been terribly burned several times after astronomical purchases that turned out to be not good enough. Filipe Coutinho is just one example, Usman Dembele is still walking on the edge of a chasm, and for the two of them Barcelona has paid over € 300,000,000 since Neymar transferred to PSG for a record € 222,000,000. Defense problems, and especially spending too much money on stoppers still required to succeed Gerard Pike and Carles Pujol, are a story in themselves.
Essentially, Barcelona has made too many wrong moves in recent years and now the results of such a business are being reflected. This is why Barcelona has been working hard to wipe away perennial biscuits and make smart moves continuously ... In search of adequate creativity, Barcelona scouts often stopped by the name of Kai Haverca.
The German national team has long been in Barsa's scouting system, but until now there have always been reasons why his name should be avoided when it comes to shopping in summer or winter.
Barcelona's broadcasters, the Catalan media reveals, have been following Haverca at every game for the last two years! So serious is the analysis of players that could be a new big pledge in the football market. It all started back in December 2017, when his talent was recognized, and above all the sense of goals, dribbling and assists that confirmed his good vision for the game. Theoretically, Haverz is a player who would fit perfectly with the Barcelona system, as a selfless footballer capable of withstanding the great pressure of rivals and opening the game in transition.
Of course, the Scouts were also present at Bayer Stadium where Leverkusen smashed Madrid's Atletico 2-1, with Kai Haverc playing one of the leading roles. Referring to Frankie de Jong's example, Barcelona's transfer policy could take a major turn and finally be back in the club's reputation. To reclaim the lost identity of smart shopping and bringing in players who can really make a difference. This, after all, is what Barcelona is missing now.
According to information from Catalonia, Haverc has made drastic progress in the game compared to two years ago. In addition to pure technical qualities, Haverc has done a great deal to cover the left and right sides of the midfield equally well. With strong attacking qualities, he now pays more attention to defending and putting pressure on opposing midfielders to slow action. This is seriously appreciated in Catalonia.
Allegedly, part of the club management believes that next summer is the right time to embark on a full offensive against Haverc, and there are even stories that he has been contacted informally and told in his face that they want him at Camp Nou next summer.
It remains to clarify the question of its price. In Bayer, they are aware that the Haverc games are watched by people from Bayern, Liverpool and Manchester United, so the value of their pearl is growing. Currently, the price is set at € 100,000,000, but no one can guarantee that this will not change any time soon.
If Haverc continues to pick up pace and build games based on last season, Barça will have no choice but to break the barrier again and sign another nine-digit transfer ...
